text:
liteal pterygium syndrome
What are the treatments for popliteal pterygium syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of popliteal pterygium syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: IRF6-Related Disorders  - Genetic Testing Registry: Popliteal pterygium syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative
